india_tips.description: Small gestures that open big doors. Social etiquette in India is an art of respect.
india_tips.meal_alert: It's meal time! Remember the right-hand protocol.

dress.desc: Cover shoulders and knees in sacred places. A scarf (foulard) is your best ally.
dress.title: Social Dress

hand.desc: Always use your right hand for eating, giving money, or greeting. The left is considered impure.
hand.title: The Right Hand

shanti.desc: Infinite patience. Chaos is not an error; it's part of the experience. Flow with it, don't fight it.
shanti.title: Shanti Attitude

shoes.desc: Remove your shoes before entering homes, temples, and even some shops. Comfortable sandals are key.
shoes.title: Shoes Off

india_tips.title: Respect & Culture

visa.title: Manage your Mandatory Visa
visa.description: For tourism, the “e-tourist Visa” is processed online and is the most common option

passport.title: Check your Passport
passport.description: At least two blank pages and validity for six months

backup.title: Digital Backups
backup.description: Scan your documents and save them in the cloud or in your email

vaccines.title: Recommended Vaccines
vaccines.description: Recommended: Hepatitis A and B, Tetanus and Typhoid Fever.

water.title: Water, Always bottled!
water.description: Use it even to brush your teeth and avoid ice or raw salads.

tips_oil.title: Practical Tips
tips_oil.description: Avoid mustard oil in street food

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: Use repellent to prevent dengue and protect yourself from the intense sun

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Don't try to see it all. Don't waste your time in transport

driving.title: Don't drive
driving.description: Chaotic and dangerous traffic makes renting a car inadvisable.

apps.title: Use Apps like Uber or Ola
apps.description: You'll avoid constant bargaining and ensure a fair price in the city.

trains.title: Trains: Book!
trains.description: Seats (AC classes) sell out fast. Use Apps like 12Go Asia.

driver.title: Private Driver
driver.description: Highly recommended for routes like the Golden Triangle (at least the first time)

airport.title: Delhi Airport Tip
airport.description: Uber has a specific pickup area and a stand with WI-FI to order it.

tuktuk.title: Tuk-Tuk. Agree on the price
tuktuk.description: If you take a Rickshaw on the street it is essential to negotiate before getting on

medical.title: Medical Assistance and Repatriation
medical.description: Look for a minimum coverage of €500,000 for hospitalisation, tests and surgery

repatriation.title: Medical Transfer and Early Return
repatriation.description: Must include unlimited repatriation and return for serious family emergencies

luggage.title: Luggage
luggage.description: Protection against loss, theft, damage or delay in delivery

cancellation.title: Trip Cancellation
cancellation.description: Refund of non-recoverable expenses if you cannot travel for justified reasons

liability.title: Public Liability
liability.description: Protects you if you cause accidental damage to other people or their property

payment.title: How to Pay and Shop
payment.description: You will need Rupees (INR) for day-to-day. Use Revolut or N26 cards to avoid high commissions

bargaining.title: Bargaining is a Game
bargaining.description: It is mandatory in markets and transport. Always offer a much lower initial price, always with respect

gem_scam.title: Jewelry Scam (Jaipur and Agra)
gem_scam.description: They offer you "tax-free" gems for resale. It's false. They have no value

fake_guides.title: Fake Drivers and Guides
fake_guides.description: They will tell you your hotel or place is "closed" to take you to different or fake travel agencies

fake_inspectors.title: Fake Train Inspectors
fake_inspectors.description: They will ask for your ticket before boarding to tell you it's not valid. Real inspectors are inside.

namaste.title: Greeting: "Namasté"
namaste.description: Join palms at chest height and bow your head to greet and thank.

right_hand.title: Sacred Right Hand
right_hand.description: Always use it for eating, paying or offering something. The left is considered impure

staring.title: They will stare
staring.description: It is common for them to look at you with curiosity and ask for photos. If it makes you uncomfortable, you can politely refuse

dress_code.title: Dress Modestly
dress_code.description: Cover shoulders and legs, especially in religious places, out of cultural respect.

barefoot.title: Take off Shoes
barefoot.description: Carry socks in your backpack to protect your feet from the ground or its heat.

cremations.title: Photographing Cremations is Prohibited
cremations.description: It is a very serious lack of respect and can lead to serious problems.

config.title: Set up eSIM
config.description: Configure it from home and you will have internet connection right upon landing

sim.title: Local Alternative: Physical SIM
sim.description: Buy it at official stores and keep in mind that activation can take hours

apps.title: Download Apps before Traveling
apps.description: They are vital: maps, trains and urban transport like Uber or Ola

patience.title: Patience. Your Ally
patience.description: Accept the Chaos. Keep calm in the face of the unexpected

anger.title: Getting Angry Solves Nothing
anger.description: Losing your cool or shouting only worsens the situation and your travel experience

adaptation.title: Adaptation. The Key is to Enjoy
adaptation.description: Prepare for culture shock, especially at the beginning.

prejudice.title: Travel Without Prejudice
prejudice.description: Focus on enjoying the unique experience that India offers you

backpack.title: Backpack > Suitcase with Wheels
backpack.description: Floors without sidewalks or dirt make it difficult to drag suitcases

earplugs.title: Earplugs
earplugs.description: Essential to be able to rest if the environment is extremely noisy

sarong.title: Sarong
sarong.description: Used to cover up on trains or when entering sacred places

adapter.title: Plug Adapter (D and M)
adapter.description: Types D and M, necessary because the European plug is not compatible

socks.title: Extra Socks
socks.description: Remember the need to take off your shoes in temples and the possible heat of the ground

ring.title: Consider wearing a Fake Ring
ring.description: If you are alone, saying you are married helps avoid uncomfortable situations

crowds.title: Avoid Crowds
crowds.description: In massive events like festivals (Holi), unwanted touching is common

eye_contact.title: Do Not Keep Gaze
eye_contact.description: Avoid staring in the street to prevent cultural misunderstandings.

logistics.offline_alert: Offline Mode Enabled - Critical Data Available
logistics.title: Travel Logistics

visa.title: Process your Schengen Visa
visa.description: Indian citizens require a short-stay Schengen visa for stays up to 90 days. Apply at least 15 days in advance at BLS centers.

passport.title: Check Passport Validity
passport.description: Your passport must have at least two blank pages, been issued in the last 10 years and be valid for 3 months after departure.

funds.title: Prove Financial Means
funds.description: Authorities may require proof of solvency; the current minimum is approximately 118,40 € per person per day.

insurance.title: Compulsory Health Insurance
insurance.description: It is mandatory to have health insurance with minimum coverage of €30,000 including emergency hospitalization and repatriation.

water.title: Tap Water: Drink with Confidence!
water.description: Unlike other destinations, in Valladolid tap water is soft and of excellent quality, among the best in Spain.

sun.title: Protection from the Castilian Sun
sun.description: In June and summer, the sun is very intense. Use sunscreen, a hat and stay hydrated to avoid heat stroke.

emergency.title: Health Emergencies
emergency.description: In case of any life-threatening emergency, call 112 for free. The health emergency service operates 24 hours.

flights.title: Direct Flights Delhi-Madrid
flights.description: Iberojet operates direct connections between New Delhi and Madrid, facilitating access to the Spanish capital.

ave.title: Connect with AVE (High Speed)
ave.description: From Chamartín station in Madrid, the AVE train will take you to Valladolid in just 1 hour.

valbuena_car.title: Transfer to Valbuena de Duero
valbuena_car.description: Valbuena is in the heart of Ribera del Duero. Taxi or car rental from Valladolid is recommended (approx 45 min).

kiss.title: The Greeting: Two Kisses
kiss.description: It is common to greet with two kisses on the cheeks between women or between men and women. Men usually shake hands.

meal_times.title: Late Meal Times
meal_times.description: Be patient: lunch is usually at 2:00 PM and dinner doesn't start before 9:00 PM.

siesta.title: Respect the Siesta
siesta.description: Some small shops in Valladolid and Valbuena close from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM for rest or lunch.

payments.title: Euro and Digital Payments
payments.description: The official currency is the Euro (€). Madrid and Valladolid are very digitized; use contactless cards for almost everything.

taxfree.title: Tax Free (VAT Savings)
taxfree.description: As a non-EU resident, you can request a VAT refund (generally 21%) on your purchases.

tapas.title: The Art of Tapeo (Pinchos)
tapas.description: Valladolid is famous for its 'pinchos'. Tipping is not mandatory, but rounding up the bill is appreciated.

esim.title: eSIM: Instant Connection
esim.description: The most convenient option is an eSIM (like Holafly or MicroEsim). Configure it from home.

security_net.title: Cybersecurity while Traveling
security_net.description: Avoid public WiFi for banking. It is recommended to use a VPN to protect your personal data.

wine.title: Land of Great Wines
wine.description: Valbuena de Duero is home to prestigious wineries like Vega Sicilia. Enjoy Ribera del Duero red wines.

clothing.title: Layered Clothing
clothing.description: Even if days are warm, nights in the northern plateau can be cool. Always carry a thin jacket.

pickpockets.title: Watch out for Pickpockets
pickpockets.description: Thieves usually act in crowded places. Always keep your backpack or bag closed and in front of you.

petitions.title: The Signature Scam
petitions.description: Distrust people who approach you asking to sign a 'petition'. It is a distraction tactic.

rosemary.title: The Rosemary Sprig
rosemary.description: In tourist areas, they may offer you a sprig of rosemary to 'read your fortune' and then demand money.

taxi_fixed.title: Taxis: Fixed Rate
taxi_fixed.description: Barajas Airport - Madrid center transfer costs €33 (fixed). Ensure the meter is working for other trips.

menu_prices.title: Menus without Prices
menu_prices.description: Some restaurants do not include prices on specials. Always ask for the price before ordering.

fake_charity.title: Fake Charities
fake_charity.description: Scammers pose as NGO volunteers to ask for cash donations. Only collaborate through official channels.

items.q: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
